src:
Micov sa Armanijem sašio prvi poraz Barselone
01 Nov 2019, 22:02 by Darko
Armani – Barselona 83:70 (15:20, 15:17, 22:21, 31:12)
Nema neporaženih ekipa u Evroligi posle šestog kola. Barselonin pobedonosni niz završen je u Milanu, gde je Armani upisao petu uzastopnu evroligašku pobedu ove sezone, a naneo Kataloncima prvi poraz.
Ekipa Svetislava Pešića je dobro otvorila utakmicu, vođstvom od 7:0 i sve do poslednje četvrtine je delovala sigurno.
Poslednjih deset minuta međutim, proteklo je u dominaciji domaćina. Serijom od 12:2, uz dve trojke Dela Valea, Armani je preuzeo vođstvo i dodavao gas kako se meč bližio kraju. Barsa je u poslednjoj četvrtini postigla samo 12, a primila 31 poen i poraz je bio neminovan.
Vladimir Micov je sa 16 poena, osam skokova i tri asistencije bio među najzapaženijim igračima milanskog tima. Efikasniji od njega bio je samo Serhio Rodrigez sa 17 poena i sedam asistencija, dok je Luis Skola dodao 14 poena, uz devet skokova. Nemanja Nedović je za 23 minuta postigao šest poena, uz jedan skok i tri asistencije.
U Barseloni su najefikasniji bili Brendon Dejvis sa 15 i Nikola Mirotić sa 13 poena.
Armani i Barselona posle 6. kola Evrolige imaju skor od pet pobeda i jednog poraza.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Micov sews first defeat of Barcelona with Armani
01 Nov 2019, 21:02 by Darko
Armani - Barcelona 83:70 (15:20, 15:17, 22:21, 31:12)
There are no undefeated teams in the Euroleague after the sixth round. Barcelona's winning streak ended in Milan, where Armani recorded his fifth consecutive Euroleague win of the season, inflicting a first defeat on the Catalans.
Svetislav Pesic's team opened the game well, with a 7-0 lead and it seemed safe until the last quarter.
The last ten minutes, however, were dominated by the hosts. With a 12-2 run, with two Del Vale triples, Armani took the lead and added gas as the match drew to a close. Barça scored only 12 in the last quarter, receiving 31 points and defeat was imminent.
With 16 points, eight rebounds and three assists, Vladimir Micov was among the most noted players in the Milan team. More efficient than him was only Sergio Rodrigez with 17 points and seven assists, while Luis Skola added 14 points with nine rebounds. Nemanja Nedovic scored six points in 23 minutes with one rebound and three assists.
In Barcelona, Brendon Davis with 15 points and Nikola Mirotic with 13 points were most effective.
Armani and Barcelona after the 6th round of Euroleague have a score of five wins and one defeat.
